Posts.Content: Jan 14, 2009 01:30PM STEPBYSTEP wrote: HI LAURIE JUST WANTED TO LET YOU KNOW HOW IT WAS FOR ME AFTER MY LUMPECTOMY 8 YEARS AGO, I HAD THE PROCEDURE ON THURSDAY AND WENT BACK TO WORK ON FOLLOWING MONDAY, DRAIN TUBE AND ALL.  MY WONDERFUL DOCTOR TOLD ME THE BEST BANDAGE TO USE WAS A FEMININE PAD WHICH WORKED GREAT. OF COURSE I WORE AN EXTRA LARGE BRA AND VERY LOOSE FITTING CLOTHES.  BUT WAS ABLE TO WORK MY DESK JOB JUST FINE AS LONG AS I DID NOT LIFT ANYTHING, THAT WAS THE MAIN THING. THAT WAS MY LEFT BREAST, THEN LAST SUMMER I HADE A PARTIAL MAST ON THE RIGHT SIDE AND ONCE AGAIN I HAD THE SURGERY ON THURSDAY AND BACK AT WORK ON MONDAY.  I HAD MY RADIATION EACH DAY AT 4 AND WENT DIRECTLY HOME AFTERWARDS.  SO WHERE THERE IS A WILL THERE IS A WAY.... ELAINE
